author: Dr. Vinayak Kumar
title: Texas, Florida may be the next hot spots for COVID-19
description: New York has been labeled as the current epicenter of the outbreak.
content: The COVID-19 pandemic has spread rapidly, with 100,000 additional confirmed cases in the U.S. this past week alone, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University. Part of the U.S. and the global community have been trying to combat this spread of the… [+3691 chars]
